Description of incident: Between Oct. 1, 201 and Dec. 22, 2017, Orbitz determined that an unauthorized third party may have accessed personal information stored on a third party business partner platform. Information affected including name, payment card number and expiration date, phone number, email address and physical and/or billing address. Certain hotel reservations made through Southwest.com, whih was powere dby orbitz, may have been affected.
